Hi there! I'm a 28 (going to be 29 in March), fit/thin. Not into drugs (including 420) or crazy parties/clubs. I'm fairly introverted, but with the right person I can be pretty chatty! :) Here's a little about what I like to do in my spare time & what I'm looking for... :)

I really like to be outdoors, hit up the beach or a park. I also love listening to music, whether that's jamming in my car, dancing in my apartment or going to a concert. I love quaint coffee shops, vintages stores and hanging out with friends. I also really love board games, happy hour/wine tasting, trying new things, arts/crafts, going on road trips, binge watching my favorite shows on Hulu or Netflix, just about anything!

I'm really just looking for new people to meet, hang out with, & get to know. I'd like to meet some like-minded people, with similar interests & similar meanings of friendship. By no means am I expecting a friendship to turn into romance, that's not why I'm on here. However, if things go that direction in time, then I'm all for it! 

As for my looks, you could say I'm a little of everything. I can easily go from heels and a dress to skinny jeans and some chucks. Usually I like to wear whatever is comfortable for me that day, which is probably jeans, a t-shirt and my chucks. Haha! But every now and again, I enjoy a little flare! :D

To be fair, I should mention that I currently reside in Santa Barbara. However, I've lived in LA before and know the area pretty well. So if that isn't a "deal breaker" to you, then please message me! I have absolutely no problem going out to LA to meet you, should things work out that way. 

Please tell me about yourself, you know, more than ONE sentence. 

*No men. No couples. No Nude Pics*
Cheers!
